title: # 436 - D.C. Benny & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian D.C. Benny. We talk about working the Boston Comedy Club, Tony Woods, Patrice O’Neal, Tracy Morgan, comedy during a pandemic and much more! 

D.C. Benny has a new stand up special “Adrift in Predicaments: Stories of shoulda known better” available here: https://allthingscomedy.com/videos/dc-benny-adrift-in-predicaments 

This podcast is brought to you by Hims. Go to http://www.forhims.com/bertcast for your free visit.

This episode is brought to you by Policy Genius. In just a few minutes you can find your best price and apply at http://www.policygenius.com  

This episode is also brought to you by Miller High Life, The Champagne of Beers. A quality beer within everyone’s reach. Please enjoy responsibly 

This episode is also brought to you by Harry’s. Redeem a Harry’s Trial Set at http://www.HARRYS.COM/BERT for just $3!

This episode is also brought to you by Kusy Dreams CBD. Go to http://www.KushyDreams.com and use the Promo Code “BERT” for 20% off your order. 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
